Take a walk back through the history of Columbus and learn about the past mayors of Columbus since the City was re-incorporated in 1927.

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001919/zumthumb.gif)


[Oscar Abraham Zumwalt](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_zumwalt)
January 15, 1927 - April 14, 1941

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001921/irwthumb.gif)


[Enoch Edward Irwin](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_irwin)
April 14, 1941 - April 13, 1953

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001923/taythumb.gif)


[William Reginald "Rip" Taylor](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_taylor)
April 13, 1953 - April 8, 1957

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001926/meythumb.gif)


[Henry Perry Meyer](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_meyer)
April 8, 1957 - April 10, 1961

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001928/kinthumb.gif)


[George Leslie Herbet King](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_king)
April 10, 1961 - April 9, 1973

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001930/kucthumb.gif)


[William Anthony Kuchar](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_kuchar)
April 9, 1973 - April 9, 1979

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001933/heffley_1th.gif)


[Roy Richard Heffley](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_heffley_1)
April 9, 1979 - May 13, 1991

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001935/dunthumb.gif)


[Dwain Keith Dungen](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_dungen)
May 13, 1991 - May 22, 1995

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001937/hanthumb.gif)


[Thomas Beattie Hancher](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_hancher)
May 22, 1995 - May 10, 1999

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001940/frnthumb.gif)


[Paula Frnka](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_frnka)
May 10, 1999 to May7, 2005

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001942/heffley_pic2.jpg)


[Roy Richard Heffley](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_heffley_2)
May 7, 2005 to May 2009

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001944/Dwain%20Dungen%20pic%202.jpg)


[Dwain Keith Dungen](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_dungen_2)
May 8, 2009 - August 2018

![](https://www.columbustexas.net/upload/page/0186/widgets/image/001947/Gobert_Mayor.jpg)


[Lori An Gobert](https://www.columbustexas.net/page/city.mayors_gobert)

August 2018 to Present
